content: Update PathKind enum variants to add type_name field
Update PathKind constructors to accept type_name parameter
Add type_name() method to PathKind
Move to_path_segment() from PathKind to RecursionContext as private method
Run build-check.sh after PathKind changes
Update RecursionContext struct to use PathKind instead of PathLocation
Update RecursionContext::new() to accept PathKind parameter
Update RecursionContext::type_name() to use path_kind
Update RecursionContext::create_field_context() to accept PathKind and implement new logic
Remove PathLocation enum and all its methods
Run build-check.sh after RecursionContext changes
Update array_builder.rs to use PathKind constructors instead of PathLocation
Update array_builder.rs create_field_context() calls to pass PathKind
Run build-check.sh after array_builder changes
Update struct_builder.rs to use PathKind constructors
Update tuple_builder.rs to use PathKind constructors
Update list_builder.rs to use PathKind constructors
Update map_builder.rs to use PathKind constructors
Update set_builder.rs to use PathKind constructors
Update enum_builder.rs to use PathKind constructors
Update default_builder.rs to use PathKind constructors
Run build-check.sh after all builder updates
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues following warning rules
Run cargo nextest run
